body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**

* Opt-in option to have timers/histograms in integer milliseconds instead of float seconds
* Opt-in option to have counters suffixed with `_total` and histograms end with `_milliseconds` or `_seconds`
* Do not report a gauge value if no value is ever set for it

comments.body: Renaming should go through a [view](https://pkg.go.dev/go.opentelemetry.io/otel/sdk/metric#View) we should provide a sample showing how. I am not sure if changing the metric type can be done through a view, if not then agree we should add. Agree with the last point.
